Name: Absorbent Touch
Description: Regular attacks sometimes absorb a portion of the enemy's MP.

Description: Makes it somewhat easier to avoid enemy attacks.

Name: Adrenaline Rush
Description: Greatly increases the attack after inflicting a critical hit.

Name: Agent of Chaos
Description: Always attacks an enemy when the monster is confused. Successful strikes inflict critical hits.

Name: Attacking Impulse
Description: Increases damage inflicted when HP drop to 1/2.

Name: Auto-Cadabra
Description: Restores a small amount of MP after each action.

Name: Auto-Restora
Description: Restores a small amount of HP after each action.

Name: Bangmeister
Description: Increases the potency of explosie attacks and decreases their MP consumption.

Name: Beastsbane
Description: Increases damage inflicted on monsters from the beast family and slightly lowers all resistances.

Name: Benefaction
Description: Massively increases the attack, defence, agility and wisdom of allies when a killer blow is received.

Name: Big Bully
Description: Increases damage inflicted on L-size monsters

Name: Bigger Upper
Description: Extends the duration of skills that raise the strength, defence, agility or wisdom of allies to 5 turns. In addtion, randomly grants invincibility, the ability to reflect spells or breath attacks, or raises evasion.

Name: Castslasher
Description: Reduces MP consumption by 1/2.

Name: Clear Thinker
Description: Slightly increases resistance to confusion.

Name: Close Scraper
Description: Sometimes allows the monster to survive at 1 HP after suffering an attack that would otherwise kill it.

Name: Collective Punishment
Description: Attacks that do more damage as the attack attribute increases will strike all enemies insetead of a single target.

Name: Confusing Touch
Description: Regular attacks sometimes confuse the enemy.

Name: Crackmeister
Description: Increases the potency of ice-elemental attacks and decreases their MP consumption.

Name: Crafty Devil
Description: Makes it moderately easier to inflict status ailments on the enemy.

Name: Cragmeister
Description: Increases the potency of earth-elemental attacks and decreases their MP consumption.

Name: Critical Mastermind
Description: Makes it much easier to cast critical spells.

Name: Critical Moment
Description: Makes it easier to inflict critical hits when HP drops to 1/2, and even more so when HP drops to 1/4.

Name: Critical Sensation
Description: Makes it much easier to inflict critical hits.

Name: Critical Theorist
Description: Makes it somewhat easier to cast critical spells.

Name: Critical Triumph
Description: Makes it somewhat easier to inflict critical hits.

Name: Deadly Touch
Description: Regular attacks sometimes kill the enemy instantly.

Name: Death Defier
Description: Slightly increases resistance to instant death.

Name: Decontaminate
Description: Sometimes cures allies of sleep, confusion, poison, severe poison, and paralysis durin battle.

Description: Raises defence by 12.

Name: Defensive Impulse
Description: Reduces damage received when HP drop to 1/2.

Name: Desperate Measures
Description: Negates all damage suffered from critical hits and critical spells.

Name: Detox
Description: Sometimes cures allies of poison, severe poison and paralysis during battle.

Name: Dodge Denier
Description: Ensures the enemy cannot avoid attacks.

Name: Dragonsbane
Description: Increases damage inflicted on monsters from the dragon family and slightly lowers all resistances.

Name: Drain Blocker
Description: Slightly increases resistance to MP absorption.

Name: Echonomist
Description: Sometimes casts the same spell twice. Consumes slightly more MP than usual.

Name: Evasive Impulse
Description: Sometimes increases evasion and greatly increases agility during battle when HP has dropped to 1/2. Only activates once per battle.

Name: Fidget
Description: Slightly increases resistance to paralysis.

Name: Frizzmeister
Description: Increases the potency of fire-elemental attacks and decreases their MP consumption.

Name: Granite Chin
Description: Slightly increases resistance to being stunned.

Name: Health Professional
Description: Increases the potency of healing skills and decreases their MP consumption.

Name: Heaven-Sent
Description: Sometimes greatly increases attack, defense, agility or wisdom during battle.

Name: High Heal
Description: Sometimes restores 80 or more HP to all allies during battle. Higher wisdom makes the healing effect more powerfull.

Name: Hothead
Description: Makes it easier to activate a frenzied state, turning the monster into a formidable fighting force.

Name: Infected Skin
Description: Sometimes poisons enemies that inflict indirect attacks.

Name: Insensitive Skin
Description: Sometimes paralyses enemies that inflict direct attacks.

Name: Insomniac
Description: Slightly increases resistance to being put to sleep.

Name: Insta-Accel
Description: Monster sometimes casts Accelerate on itself at the start of battle.

Name: Insta-Bounce
Description: Monster sometimes casts Bounce on itself at the start of battle.

Name: Insta-Buff
Description: Monster sometimes casts Buff on itself at the start of battle.

Name: Insta-Oomph
Description: Monster sometimes casts Oomph on itself at the start of battle.

Name: Insta-Ping
Description: Monster sometimes casts Ping on itself at the start of battle.

Name: Insult to Injury
Description: Increases damage inflicted on enemies that are poisoned, severely poisoned, stunned, asleep, confused or paralysed.

Name: Intimidating
Description: Sometimes stuns the enemy during battle for 1 turn.

Name: Last Gasp
Description: Revives a single ally after it falls in battle. Only works once per battle.

Name: Last Legs
Description: Allows the montser to survive at 1 HP after suffering an attack that would otherwise kill it.

Name: Late Bloomer
Description: Increases attack, defence, agility and wisdom from round 3 onwards, and even more so from round 6.

Name: Little Menace
Description: Increases damage inflicted on S-size monsters.

Name: Low Heal
Description: Sometimes restores 30 or more HP to all allies during battle. Higher wisdom makes the healing effect more powerfull.

Name: Magical Moment
Description: Makes it easier to inflict cast critical spells when HP drops to 1/2, and even more so when HP drops to 1/4.

Name: Major Downer
Description: Extends the duration of skills that lower the strength, defence, agility or wisdom of enemies to 5 turns. In addition, randomly prevents breath attacks, critical hits or the casting of magic, or bedazzles the enemy.

Name: Matterbane
Description: Increases damage inflicted on monsters from the material family and slightly lowers all resistances.

Name: Metal Beater
Description: Inflicts additional damage on enemies. A higher level increases the effect. Works on enemies with the Metal Skin trait.

Name: Metal Medley
Description: Ignores the damage-reducing effect that the Metal Skin trait provides.

Name: Miraculous Touch
Description: Regular attacks restore 1/2 of the damage they inflict on the enemy as HP.

Name: Naked Ambition
Description: Increases the likelihood of critical hits and critical spells if no accessory is equipped.

Name: Naturesbane
Description: Increases damage inflicted on monsters from the nature family and slightly lowers all resistances.

Name: Paralysing Touch
Description: Regular attacks sometimes paralyse the enemy.

Name: Parting Gift
Description: Inflicts damage back on all enemies when a killer blow is received. The amount inflicted is proportional to the excess damage suffered after the monster's HP are reduced to zero.

Name: Personal Grudge
Description: Greatly decreases the attack, defence, agility and wisdom of an enemy that lands a killer blow, and stuns them for the next turn.

Name: Poisonous Touch
Description: Regular attacks sometimes poison the enemy.

Name: Rando-Accel
Description: Monster sometimes casts Accelerate on itself during battle.

Name: Rando-Buff
Description: Monster sometimes casts Buff on itself during battle.

Name: Rando-Disrupt
Description: Sometimes uses Disruptive Wave during battle.

Name: Rando-Mister
Description: Monster sometimes casts Mist Me on itself during battle.

Name: Rando-Muster
Description: Sometimes uses Muster Strength during battle.

Name: Rando-Oomph
Description: Monster sometimes casts Oomph on itself during battle.

Name: Rando-Panic
Description: Monster sometimes casts Wave of Panic on itself during battle.

Name: Rando-Ping
Description: Monster sometimes casts Ping on itself during battle.

Name: Rando-Relief
Description: Monster sometimes casts Wave of Relief on itself during battle.

Name: Sizzmeister
Description: Increases the potency of light-elemental attacks and decreases their MP consumption.

Name: Sleep Twitch
Description: Attacks all enemies when the monster is asleep.

Name: Sleepy Touch
Description: Regular attacks sometimes put the enemy to sleep.

Name: Slick Skin
Description: Sometimes causes incoming direct attacks to miss.

Name: Snappy Comeback
Description: Inflicts damage back on an enemy that lands a killer blow. The amount inflicted is proportional to the excess damage suffered after the monster's HP are reduced to zero.

Name: Sobering Slap
Description: Sometimes cures allies of sleep and confusion during battle.

Name: Somnolent Skin
Description: Sometimes cuts enemies that inflect direct attacks to sleep.

Name: Spellbinder
Description: Slightly increases resistance to antimagic.

Name: Spiky Skin
Description: Returns 1/4 of the damage suffered from direct attacks back at the attacking enemy.

Name: Splishmeister
Description: Increases the potency of water-elemental attacks and decreases their MP consumption.

Name: Spongy Skin
Description: Sometimes absorbs MP from enemies that inflict direct attacks.

Name: Static Discharge
Description: Sometimes paralyses enemies that inflict direct attacks when the monster is paralysed itself.

Name: Strangely Alluring
Description: Sometimes stuns the enemy during battle for 1 turn.

Name: Strong Starter
Description: Raises damage inflicted on enemies up to round 3, but lowers it from round 4 onwards.

Name: Stunning Skin
Description: Sometimes stuns enemies that inflict direct attacks for 1 turn.

Name: Stunning Touch
Description: Regular attacks sometimes stun the enemy for 1 turn.

Name: Stupefying Skin
Description: Sometimes confuses enemies that inflict direct attacks.

Name: Supreme Sidestepper
Description: Makes it much easier to avoid enemy attacks.

Name: Tactical Commander
Description: Performs 2 actions in a row. The number of actions is not affected if you don't issue specific orders. Slightly lowers the monster's attributes.

Name: Tactical Genius
Description: Sometimes performs 2 or 3 actions in a row. The number of actions is not affected if you don't issue specific orders. Slightly lowers the monster's attributes.

Name: Tactical Titan
Description: Performs 2 or 3 actions in a row. The number of actions is not affected if you don't issue specific orders. Lowers the monster's attribute.

Name: Tactical Trooper
Description: Sometimes performs 2 actions in a row. The number of actions is not affected if you don't issue specific orders. Very slightly lowers the monster's attributes.

Name: Tit for Tat
Description: When a monster is inflicted with a status ailment, the attacking enemy will have the same ailment inflicted back on them.

Name: Tough Customer
Description: Slightly increases resistance to debilitation.

Name: Trance State
Description: Greatly increases wisdom after casting a critical spell.

Description: Greatly increases damage inflicted on monsters from the beast family and somewhat lowers all resistances.

Name: Über Zombiesbane
